类的使用
org.apache.catalina.deploy.FilterMap

  • 使用FilterMap的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    org.apache.catalina  
    org.apache.catalina.core  
    org.apache.catalina.deploy
    This package contains Java objects that represent complex data structures from the web application deployment descriptor file (web.xml).
    org.apache.catalina.startup  

    • org.apache.catalina中FilterMap的使用

      返回FilterMap的org.apache.catalina中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      FilterMap[] Context.findFilterMaps()
      Return the set of filter mappings for this Context.
      参数类型为FilterMap的org.apache.catalina中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void Context.addFilterMap(FilterMap filterMap)
      Add a filter mapping to this Context.
      void Context.addFilterMapBefore(FilterMap filterMap)
      Add a filter mapping to this Context before the mappings defined in the deployment descriptor but after any other mappings added via this method.
      void Context.removeFilterMap(FilterMap filterMap)
      Remove a filter mapping from this Context.

    • org.apache.catalina.core中FilterMap的使用

      返回FilterMap的org.apache.catalina.core中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      FilterMap[] StandardContext.findFilterMaps()
      Return the set of filter mappings for this Context.
      参数类型为FilterMap的org.apache.catalina.core中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void StandardContext.addFilterMap(FilterMap filterMap)
      Add a filter mapping to this Context at the end of the current set of filter mappings.
      void StandardContext.addFilterMapBefore(FilterMap filterMap)
      Add a filter mapping to this Context before the mappings defined in the deployment descriptor but after any other mappings added via this method.
      void StandardContext.removeFilterMap(FilterMap filterMap)
      Remove a filter mapping from this Context.
